para.text: The per diem rate to be charged for skilled care patients at District of Columbia Village shall be $82.50.
The per diem rate to be charged for intermediate care patients at District of Columbia Village shall be $56.00.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: Sept. 14, 1976, D.C. Law 1-82, title IV, § 402, 23 DCR 2461
